alert.note: Alert for Eastern Curry County and Josephine County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 5:20AM PST until February 28 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST TUESDAY BELOW 1500 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 1500 feet, heavy snow. Snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches with more than 2 feet expected in the higher terrain. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory below 1500 feet, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...For the Winter Storm Warning, the I-5 passes north of Grants Pass, including the Kalmiopsis Wilderness, Bear Camp Road, and highway 199 from Hayes Hill Summit southward. For the Winter Weather Advisory, Grants Pass, the Applegate Valley, including a portion of Route 238 between Murphy and Provolt. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 4 PM PST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For the lower elevations around Grants Pass, snowfall of a dusting to 2 inches is likely this morning. Some melting is likely this afternoon, then additional accumulating snow will follow later tonight into Tuesday morning. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Travel is strongly discouraged because of dangerous conditions. * If you must travel, keep tire chains, a flashlight, blankets, food, water, medications, and a fully charged phone with you. * The safest place during a winter storm is indoors. * A Winter Storm Warning means that severe winter weather is imminent and poses a threat to life and property. Take protective action now.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Curry County and Josephine County
